about_the_game:
A first-person realistic underwater explorer. Plunge into the real world horror of the ocean's dark depths. As you head down into the trench, the dark of the abyss surrounds you.

Dark of the Depths uses realistic visuals to put you in the pitch-black atmosphere of the deepest oceans. Use your torch to guide you through the darkness, avoiding violent fish and experience our fears of what lies beneath.

Encounter creatures such as Basking sharks and Killer whales. However, larger, more ferocious beasts lurk within the dark.

Traverse a network of rusted oil structures in search of missing items. Recover interactive collectibles from wreckages and find all the items needed to complete the game and leave the ocean floor.
detailed_description:
A first-person realistic underwater explorer. Plunge into the real world horror of the ocean's dark depths. As you head down into the trench, the dark of the abyss surrounds you.

Dark of the Depths uses realistic visuals to put you in the pitch-black atmosphere of the deepest oceans. Use your torch to guide you through the darkness, avoiding violent fish and experience our fears of what lies beneath.

Encounter creatures such as Basking sharks and Killer whales. However, larger, more ferocious beasts lurk within the dark.

Traverse a network of rusted oil structures in search of missing items. Recover interactive collectibles from wreckages and find all the items needed to complete the game and leave the ocean floor.
name: Dark of the Depths
short_description: A first-person deep-sea exploration game. Use only a torch to navigate through wrecks and rusted structures, encountering both dangerous and harmless sea creatures. Uncover the mysteries of the trench, find interactive collectibles, and experience the phobia-inducing atmosphere of the ocean floor.
